name: SKCloudServiceSetupViewController
desc: A view controller that helps users perform setup for a cloud service, like an Apple Music subscription.

items.name: var delegate: SKCloudServiceSetupViewControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The cloud service view controller's delegate.

items.name: protocol SKCloudServiceSetupViewControllerDelegate
items.desc: A protocol that defines the methods a cloud service setup view controller can use to get the status of the view, including when it is dismissed.

items.name: func load(options: [SKCloudServiceSetupOptionsKey : Any], completionHandler: ((Bool, Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Loads the cloud service setup view with the specified options.

items.name: struct SKCloudServiceSetupOptionsKey
items.desc: Keys used to specify the types of setup options for a cloud service.
